ac: 28, touch 11, flat-footed 26 (+6 armor, +2 Dex, +11 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: breath weapon (30-ft. cone, 10d6 fire plus clinging flames, Reflex DC 21 half, usable every 1d4 rounds), burn (1d6, DC 21), mythic power (4/day, surge +1d8)
melee: bite +22 (2d8+9/18-20 plus burn plus trip), 2 claws +20 (2d6+9 plus burn)
feats: Alertness, Improved Critical (bite)M, Improved Initiative, Skill Focus (Stealth), Skill Focus (Survival), Weapon Focus (bite)M
senses: darkvision 60 ft., scent, see in darkness; Perception +14

sections.body: A mythic hell hound is a prince among the wolves of Hell, feral but still subservient to the archdevils. Allowed to run wild, they are the original creatures from which the "tamer" common hell hounds were made.

name: Nessian Warhound, Mythic
skills: Acrobatics +15 (+19 when jumping), Perception +14, Sense Motive +4, Stealth +17, Survival +17
